events.message: I received my order last week, but the item is not what I expected and I want to request a refund immediately.
The case has been categorized under Refund since the customer is requesting their money back for the order.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and follow up with the customer.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the recent order.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so we can process it quickly?
My order number is 123456789. The product was not as described on the website, so I want to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process and send you a prepaid return label so you can send the item back at no cost.
That sounds good to me, thank you for the quick response and help with the refund.
Your refund request has been processed and you should receive confirmation once the return is received.
We are checking in to confirm that you have returned the item and that the refund has been completed to your satisfaction.
Since your refund has been successfully processed and the issue is resolved, we are closing this support case now.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your recent support experience to help us improve.
